Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Exothermic \Ex`o*ther"mic\, a. [Pref. exo- + thermic.] (Chem.) Characterized by, or formed with, evolution of heat; as, an exothermic reaction; -- opposed to {endothermic}. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
exothermic adj : (of a chemical reaction or compound) occurring or formed with evolution of heat [syn: {exothermal}, {heat-releasing}] [ant: {endothermic}]
